content:
Hey all, in particular @Guy Bedford and others, Pavel Savara on the .NET team is using this week to implement https://github.com/pavelsavara/jsco -- with the attempt to create a browser polyfill for running components. Mainly he wants to skillup on components, but if people want to make suggestions or ask questions in the issues section, feel free. His intent is that anything the community thinks is worthwhile he could push up to the community.

GitHub - pavelsavara/jsco: Browser polyfill for running WASM components
Browser polyfill for running WASM components. Contribute to pavelsavara/jsco development by creating an account on GitHub.
